required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Visual Assessment of DAILIES® AquaComfort Plus® for Astigmatism as Compared to 1-DAY ACUVUE® MOIST® for Astigmatism
clinical_study.official_title: DAILIES® AquaComfort Plus® Toric - Comparative Assessment of Visual and Mechanical Performance

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to evaluate functional vision associated with rotational stability at blink of DAILIES® AquaComfort Plus® (DACP) Toric compared to 1-DAY ACUVUE® MOIST® for Astigmatism.

clinical_study.study_design: Allocation: Randomized, Intervention Model: Crossover Assignment, Masking: Single Blind (Investigator), Primary Purpose: Treatment

primary_outcome.measure: High Contrast Time Controlled Visual Acuity (TCVA) at Day 10
primary_outcome.description: TCVA test will be performed at 4 meters under high illumination (90%) using a Landolt ring test. For each acuity level, a series of single rings with gaps in one of four directions are presented and the percentage of correctly identified rings constitutes the score.

secondary_outcome.measure: Lens oscillation at blink at Day 10
secondary_outcome.description: Lens oscillation (rotational stability of the lens on the eye) at blink will be video-recorded. Digital images will be used to measure the rotational characteristics of the lenses and objectively measure the amplitude of the lens oscillation (in °).

arm_group.arm_group_label: DACP Toric, Then 1-DAY ACUVUE® MOIST® for Astigmatism
arm_group.description: Nelfilcon A toric contact lenses worn first, with etafilcon A toric contact lenses worn second. Each product worn bilaterally on a daily wear, daily disposable basis for 10 days.

arm_group.arm_group_label: 1-DAY ACUVUE® MOIST® for Astigmatism, Then DACP Toric
arm_group.description: Etafilcon A toric contact lenses worn first, with nelfilcon A toric contact lenses worn second. Each product worn bilaterally on a daily wear, daily disposable basis for 10 days.

intervention.arm_group_label: DACP Toric, Then 1-DAY ACUVUE® MOIST® for Astigmatism
